2.2.name: wordpress/linkworth-wp-plugin
2.2.description:
Easily publish different types of text link products and in-content ads from LinkWorth. This plugin does most of the work on your blog and centralizes the administration into a single settings page. Plugin users must have a Partner account from LinkWorth.

  • Widgets enabled
  • CSS Style your ads
  • Preset style options
  • Debugging option
  • List of all approved ads
  • Customize on settings page
  • WordPress Multisite capable: just install and go on all your blogs.
